text: te number of patients (when available) Gait disturbance 90% Sensorineural hearing impairment 90% Abnormality of the nervous system - Autosomal dominant inheritance - Progressive hearing impairment - Tinnitus - Vestibular areflexia - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rough estimate
